title: Been dishonourable for about 4 months and wont change
body: Got banned a few months ago and since then havent been swearing or anything and ive been getting honoured so i think my game has glitched because its been like 4 months and i cant get any key fragments

replies.body: There isn't exactly a set number of games played or honors needed in order to rank up out of rank 0. You need to show consistent improvement from whatever behavior happened that deserved the punishment that dropped your rank.

Nope, it takes forever (about 6months for me) to go from honor 0 -> 1.

doing /mute all 
and saying things like "gl hf" 
"gg wp " "was fun" etc helped me get out of honor 0 lol
